changes.reasoning: Add a separate CLI package to the monorepo for publishing to npm. This enables users to run 'npx codewalker init' to set up CodeWalker in any project, and 'npx codewalker visualize' to browse tracked changes in a terminal UI.
Implement the 'init' command that creates the .claude/skills/codewalker.md skill file and appends CodeWalker instructions to CLAUDE.md. The command is idempotent - it skips files that already exist.

Implement the 'visualize' command with a terminal UI that displays tracked commits. Users can switch between a tree view (expandable commits showing reasoning and files) and a table view (flat columnar display). Navigation uses vim-style keys (j/k) and Tab to switch views.
Add utility modules for git operations (getting branch name, commit list) and loading tracking files from the .codewalker directory.
